text:
@realDonaldTrump Oh come on.
You made a big mess of the pandemic, POTUS.
Yeah China was minimizing COVID-19 but you perversely ignored your US Intel's early warnings.
You sang Xi's praises in January.
Then you lost 2 months of valuable time doing nothing but rage-tweeting.
#TrumpDeathToll95K
